mapper.select: SELECT b.bbsno, b.bbstype, b.bbstitle, b.bbscontent, b.regdate, b.editdate, b.memno, b.goodsno, m.username, m.userid, g.gname, g.gprice, g.goodsno, i.imgname, i.imgpath, i.imgext FROM bbs b INNER JOIN members m ON b.memno=m.memno INNER JOIN goods g ON b.goodsno = g.goodsno INNER JOIN imgs i ON g.goodsno = i.goodsno WHERE b.bbstype=#{bbstype} and b.bbsno=#{bbsno} and i.imgtype="A";
SELECT bbsno, bbstype, bbstitle, bbscontent, b.regdate, b.editdate, b.memno, m.username, m.userid FROM bbs b INNER JOIN members m ON b.memno=m.memno WHERE bbstype=#{bbstype} and bbsno=#{bbsno}

SELECT m.memno, m.username, b.bbsno, b.bbstype, b.bbstitle, b.bbscontent, b.rvlike, b.regdate, b.editdate, b.goodsno, i.imgname, i.imgpath, i.imgext, i.imgtype, (SELECT i.imgname FROM imgs i WHERE i.goodsno = b.goodsno AND imgtype="A") AS giname, (SELECT i.imgpath FROM imgs i WHERE i.goodsno = b.goodsno AND imgtype="A") AS gipath, (SELECT i.imgext FROM imgs i WHERE i.goodsno = b.goodsno AND imgtype="A") AS giext FROM bbs b INNER JOIN imgs i ON i.bbsno = b.bbsno INNER JOIN members m ON b.memno = m.memno WHERE b.bbsno = #{bbsno};

SELECT bbsno, bbstype, bbstitle, bbscontent, qnasec, qnapw, rvlike, b.goodsno, b.regdate, b.editdate, b.memno, m.username, m.userid, (SELECT count(*) FROM comments c WHERE c.bbsno=b.bbsno) AS cmtcount FROM bbs b INNER JOIN members m ON b.memno=m.memno
bbstype=#{bbstype}
and bbscontent LIKE concat('%', #{bbscontent}, '%')
and bbstitle LIKE concat('%', #{bbstitle}, '%')
and username LIKE concat('%', #{username}, '%')
ORDER BY bbsno DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{listCount}

SELECT b.bbsno, b.bbstype, b.bbstitle, b.bbscontent, b.memno, b.goodsno, i.imgsno, i.imgname, i.imgpath, i.imgext, i.imgtype, i.goodsno, m.memno, m.userid FROM bbs b INNER JOIN members m ON b.memno=m.memno INNER JOIN imgs i ON b.bbsno=i.bbsno WHERE i.imgtype="C" AND b.bbstype="C"
and bbstitle LIKE concat('%', #{bbstitle}, '%')
ORDER BY bbsno ASC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{listCount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bbs b INNER JOIN members m ON b.memno=m.memno
bbstype=#{bbstype}
and bbscontent LIKE concat('%', #{bbscontent}, '%')
and bbstitle LIKE concat('%', #{bbstitle}, '%')
and username LIKE concat('%', #{username}, '%')
and userid LIKE concat('%', #{userid}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs (bbstype, bbstitle, bbscontent, qnasec, qnapw, rvlike, regdate, editdate, memno, goodsno) VALUES (#{bbstype}, #{bbstitle}, #{bbscontent}, #{qnasec}, #{qnapw}, #{rvlike}, #{regdate}, #{editdate}, #{memno}, #{goodsno})
mapper.update: UPDATE bbs SET memno=null WHERE memno=#{memno}
UPDATE bbs SET goodsno=null WHERE goodsno=#{goodsno}
